resources.string: Money Received: The amount received in the gigforce wallet from the client for the completed gigs.
Money Withdrawn: The amount transferred from the gigforce wallet to the giger’s account.
Earning: Sum of the amount received for gigs completed in this month + Sum of the amount yet to be received for completed gigs in this month
Wallet balance: Sum of the amount received in gigforce wallet till date - Sum of amount subtracted from the wallet via any transfers till date
Monthly earning: Total of the amount received in a month and the amount pending to be paid for completed gigs.
Monthly goal or monthly earning goal: a goal set by the user for monthly earning. This is the basis for showing giger’s
Payment disputed / Payment due: The amount to be paid for a completed gig that is not approved by the client.
Invoice: The receipt of completion of a gig and acknowledgment of the payment to be made to the giger.
Invoice generated: The gig where a receipt of completion of a gig and acknowledgment of the payment to be made to the giger.
Pending invoice: The gigs which are completed but the invoice is not generated.
